name: Web / Back End Developer
description:
В нашу международную команду мы приглашаем разработчиков, ищущих возможности для профессиональной самореализации и которым интересен наш проект.

Аргументированное мотивационное письмо кандидата на данную вакансию будет играть ключевую роль в принятии решения о включении кандидата в проект. Чем проект привлек внимание кандидата? Что именно кандидата заинтересовало в вакансии?

i-BrainTech is an innovative technology company that develops neuroscience-driven products in the field of SportsTech. The company is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel

Our engineering team is responsible for building complex, high-scale, real-time systems, working closely with other parts of the business to support product development.

We’re looking for a strong Back End Developer with practical experience, and the drive and enthusiasm to succeed in a professional team environment.

What is unique about us?

  • i-BrainTech is one of the first commercial companies that creates products that are based on the most advanced neuroscientific research and technology.

  • The R&D team works where Neuroscience, SportTech, Gaming, and Data Science converge.

  • A dedicated internationally distributed team.

  • Startup work mentality that encourages independence - A chance to learn, grow, lead and develop your skills in a goal-oriented environment

  • Diverse work - We are looking for ‘can-do!’ individuals that love to challenge themselves in various types of tasks

Responsibilities

You will join our growing Web Development team and be part of the R&D department.

As a Back End Developer you will be responsible for the following:

1. Backend development
Design and implement an efficient and robust system for fetching and storing data, and applying advanced analytics to it. The different projects will give you the opportunity to design the architecture and implement it in an iterative process.

Together with the CTO and the web-development team, you will be part of the decision-making process based on its technical and business development aspects.

2. Develop Internal tools
Develop tools that will track and improve performance in addition to the development of internal BI tools.

3. Security and Privacy

You will develop privacy protection and security protocols.

Requirements

  • 2+ years of experience as a Back End Developer

  • Knowledge and experience with:

    • Node.js and NPM

    • Docker composer

    • Angular / Nest.js frameworks

    • MongoDB / PostgreSQL

  • Knowledge of languages:

    • HTML, SCSS

    • Typescript and JavaScript

  • Knowledge and experience over multiple projects with AWS services

  • Excellent communication (in English) and teamwork skills

Advantages

  • Experience or great desire to integrate business needs with software development

  • Knowledge of and experience with DevOps

  • Experience developing desktop and mobile applications

  • Experience with Kubernetes development

  • Access to external advisors in the field

  • Start-up experience

  • Russian and Hebrew speaker

Seniority Level

Junior-Middle level

Industry

  • Computer Software

  • Computer Games

  • Neuro Technologies

  • Sports Technologies

Employment Opportunities

Full-time/ Project-based / Part-time
